dict.acceptation: 音乐的，用于音乐的；喜爱[精通]音乐的；音调优美的；悦耳的；
（社交性的）音乐会；[影视]歌舞片；音乐（喜）剧 = musical comedy；
喜爱[精通]音乐的；音调优美的；悦耳的；

sent.orig: The musical theater company is about to launch a new performer on the musical world.
sent.trans: 这家音乐公司即将向音乐界推出一位新人。

sent.orig: The musical ability is the precondition of success to persons who attend in musical activity.
sent.trans: 音乐能力是从事音乐活动的人能否获得成功的先决条件。

sent.orig: Such musical instrument can make musical sounds.
sent.trans: 这种乐器能奏出悦耳的声音。

sent.orig: Also, he was in a musical before so he also known as a musical actor.
sent.trans: 而且，他曾参演过音乐片，所以他也以音乐片演员而闻名。

sent.orig: Mr. Huang Zi is a famous musical educator, artist and musician theoretically Chinese recent musical history.
sent.trans: 黄自先生是我国近现代音乐史上一位著名的音乐教育家、作曲家和音乐理论家。
